mapper.sql: select beyond_mileage_fee,beyond_time_fee,record_id, order_id ,start_longitude,start_latitude, end_longitude, end_latitude ,start_time,end_time, mileage, set_meal_cost ,set_meal_mileage,set_meal_times, beyond_mileage, beyond_time ,road_and_bridge_fee,highway_toll_fee, stop_car_fee, accommodation_fee ,food_fee,others_fee,total_fee, create_by, create_time ,update_by,update_time from order_service_cost_detail_record_info
mapper.select: select beyond_mileage_fee,beyond_time_fee,total_fee,record_id, order_id, start_longitude, start_latitude, end_longitude, end_latitude, start_time, end_time, mileage, set_meal_cost, set_meal_mileage, set_meal_times, beyond_mileage, beyond_time, road_and_bridge_fee, highway_toll_fee, stop_car_fee, accommodation_fee, food_fee, others_fee, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where record_id = #{recordId}

select beyond_mileage_fee,beyond_time_fee,total_fee,record_id, order_id, start_longitude, start_latitude, end_longitude, end_latitude, start_time, end_time, mileage, set_meal_cost, set_meal_mileage, set_meal_times, beyond_mileage, beyond_time, road_and_bridge_fee, highway_toll_fee, stop_car_fee, accommodation_fee, food_fee, others_fee, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from ecmp.order_service_cost_detail_record_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into order_service_cost_detail_record_info(beyond_mileage_fee,beyond_time_fee,total_fee,order_id, start_longitude, start_latitude, end_longitude, end_latitude, start_time, end_time, mileage, set_meal_cost, set_meal_mileage, set_meal_times, beyond_mileage, beyond_time, road_and_bridge_fee, highway_toll_fee, stop_car_fee, accommodation_fee, food_fee, others_fee, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{beyondMileageGee},#{beyondTimeFee},#{total_fee},#{orderId}, #{startLongitude}, #{startLatitude}, #{endLongitude}, #{endLatitude}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{mileage}, #{setMealCost}, #{setMealMileage}, #{setMealTimes}, #{beyondMileage}, #{beyondTime}, #{roadAndBridgeFee}, #{highwayTollFee}, #{stopCarFee}, #{accommodationFee}, #{foodFee}, #{othersFee}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update order_service_cost_detail_record_info
order_id = #{orderId},
start_longitude = #{startLongitude},
start_latitude = #{startLatitude},
end_longitude = #{endLongitude},
end_latitude = #{endLatitude},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
mileage = #{mileage},
set_meal_cost = #{setMealCost},
set_meal_mileage = #{setMealMileage},
set_meal_times = #{setMealTimes},
beyond_mileage = #{beyondMileage},
beyond_time = #{beyondTime},
road_and_bridge_fee = #{roadAndBridgeFee},
highway_toll_fee = #{highwayTollFee},
stop_car_fee = #{stopCarFee},
accommodation_fee = #{accommodationFee},
food_fee = #{foodFee},
others_fee = #{othersFee},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
total_fee, = #{totalFee},
beyond_mileage_fee, = #{beyondMileageFee},
beyond_time_fee, = #{beyondTimeFee},
where record_id = #{recordId}
